Package org.drip.numerical.estimation

Class R1ToR1SeriesGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.numerical.estimation.RxToR1SeriesGenerator
      • org.drip.numerical.estimation.R1ToR1SeriesGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbramowitzStegunSeriesGenerator, ASeriesGenerator, MacLaurinSeriesGenerator
    public class R1ToR1SeriesGenerator
extends RxToR1SeriesGenerator
    R1ToR1SeriesGenerator generates the R1 To R1 Expansion Terms in the Ordered Series of the Numerical Estimate for a Function. The References are:

    • Mortici, C. (2011): Improved Asymptotic Formulas for the Gamma Function Computers and Mathematics with Applications 61 (11) 3364-3369
    • National Institute of Standards and Technology (2018): NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions https://dlmf.nist.gov/5.11
    • Nemes, G. (2010): On the Coefficients of the Asymptotic Expansion of n! https://arxiv.org/abs/1003.2907 arXiv
    • Toth V. T. (2016): Programmable Calculators â€“ The Gamma Function http://www.rskey.org/CMS/index.php/the-library/11
    • Wikipedia (2019): Stirling's Approximation https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stirling%27s_approximation


    • Module = Numerical Core Module
    • Library = Numerical Optimizer
    • Project = Numerical Analysis
    • Package = Function Numerical Estimates/Corrections/Bounds
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
